subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bobby Thomson, who died Monday, was adamant that he wasn’t tipped off to the pitch he hit for a three-run home run to win the 1951 pennant for the New York Giants.
snippet: Bobby Thomson, who died Monday, was adamant that he wasn’t tipped off to the pitch he hit for a three-run home run to win the 1951 pennant for the New York Giants.
